title: Can a spiritual healer tell if you are levitating during a cleanse?
description: Answer (1 of 3): It depends upon the development of the healer. They may be able to assess how you are thinking or feeling but that will come from a lower plane psychic communication. The best healers would not be engaging with that just putting their own energy field in order to facilitate the ...
